TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Trans-Neidonian Objects: Unexplored worlds beyond Neidon

Articles.Content:
This is meant to be an expansion to OPM and MPE, adding three new minor planets in the Kuper Belt and Scattered Disc region.

Bodies list:

  • Kuvar: Quaoar
  • Vőt: Weywot
  • Arkar: Leleākūhonua
  • Nognog: Gonggong
  • Ei: Xiangliu

Download here!: https://spacedock.info/mod/3446/Trans-Neidonian Objects

NOTE: Requires Niako's Kopernicus Utilities and Lt. Duckweed's VertexHeightOblateAdvanced

License: MIT

Edited March 28 by JoshTheKerbal
Complete Revamp v0.5

Oh! Neat idea! I like the concept. And the picture too!

 

Maybe some more screenshots to show it off/attract the users here?

 

Good luck for your project!

Daf

Well, i guess that ends the 20 day long streak of LSR being on both the most recent and most recently updated mods on the SpaceDock main page. Anyway, it was fun following the development on the Kopernicus Discord!
What if you have the Outer Planets mod? Will this conflict with that?

23 hours ago, marxman28 said:

What if you have the Outer Planets mod? Will this conflict with that?

I might add a config in a future update that detects OPM and puts these objects at even farther orbits, although they would now be TNOs instead of TJOs.
